alert.note: Alert for Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:43PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yakima County through 515 PM PDT... At 442 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rimrock, or 23 miles west of Yakima. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Yakima County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Slopes of the Eastern Washington Cascades Crest
